original_text: And he set combat commanders over the people and gathered them together to him in the square at the gate of the city and spoke encouragingly to them, saying,
korean_text: 군대 지휘관들을 세워 백성을 거느리게 하고 성문 광장에서 자기 앞에 무리를 모으고 말로 위로하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: And he set combat commanders over the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 백성 위에 군대 지휘관들을 세웠으며

sentences.original_text: and gathered them together to him
in the square at the gate of the city
